267c57eb-4a9d-4813-8185-38916ee844cf.description: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Develop an in-depth understanding of the operational drivers and their influence upon terminal performance Assess the influence of Container Yard design, the factors underpinning capacity and utilization, and leading-edge optimization strategies Calculate quay utilization and productivity, crane demand and performance Examine resource availability and how to implement demand-based resource management.
267c57eb-4a9d-4813-8185-38916ee844cf.name: Certificate in Terminal Operations

badge_template_activities.title: This is a self-paced e-learning accessible on iLearn. The 24 e-learning modules are hosted on our blended learning platform. The platform is easy to use, gives a step-by-step, structured learning experience that drives engagement with interactive modules, integrated assessments, and polls. It is also mobile-friendly which allows the participants to take the learning on the go whether it is on a commute to work or from the comfort of home!

f0b14979-938b-474f-82ce-54fb0d3da0b4.description: Lead@DPWorld Intermediate Program provides our mid to senior-level managers with the confidence and skill to lead from the middle. The program has:8 modules delivered online virtually 2-hour virtual sessions plus up to 2 hours of pre and post course work As participants go through the programme, they will have the opportunity to explore their strengths and development areas as managers, interact with and learn from various managers from across our business, and apply what they have learned.
f0b14979-938b-474f-82ce-54fb0d3da0b4.name: Lead@DPWorld Intermediate

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Navigate the competing demands and priorities that exist within the organisational structure Have the skills to face workplace challenges, such as having difficult conversations, leading teams, and dealing with complexity Bridge the gap between senior management and the front line with increased ease Walk away with tools, frameworks, and practices to help you navigate your leadership role with impact.

fb21e840-1fd6-4da2-b182-6bc93871cb09.description: Lead@DPWorld Foundation Program provides our front-line supervisors with the essential mindset, skills, and techniques needed to be effective DP World leaders. The program has:6 modules delivered online virtually 2-hour virtual sessions plus up to 2 hours of pre and post-course work As participants go through the program, they will have the opportunity to explore their strengths and development areas as leaders and interact with and learn from various supervisors from within our business.
fb21e840-1fd6-4da2-b182-6bc93871cb09.name: Lead@DPWorld Foundation

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: You will build understanding of leadership behaviours critical to success You will be able to prioritise and delegate high-value tasks and activities with confidence Role model behaviours that encourage innovation within your team Manage performance conversations to encourage performance growth

bdeec813-02bf-4f81-bba4-5652d785f645.description: The Certification on Zodiac Fundamentals targets all planning employees as well as operational teams wanting to learn how to use the system effectively. The certification might be obtained by successfully completing the five comprehensive core learning sections including Zodiac Basics, Vessel and Yard Planning, Dispatching and Vessel configuration. It is a web-based, self-paced e-learning with 5 core learning sections. Participants will be given access to Zodiacademia to complete the course.
bdeec813-02bf-4f81-bba4-5652d785f645.name: Certification on Zodiac Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: The Certification on Zodiac Fundamentals targets all planning employees as well as operational teams wanting to learn how to use the system effectively. The certification might be obtained by successfully completing the five comprehensive core learning sections including Zodiac Basics, Vessel and Yard Planning, Dispatching, and Vessel configuration. It is web-based, self-paced e-learning with 5 core learning sections. Participants will be given access to Zodiacademia to complete the course.

848f6b01-8f17-4654-9e6c-41858450fa80.description: This programme is designed to provide participants with an introduction to the principles of adult learning and the skills and techniques required to apply these principles when facilitating adult learning.
848f6b01-8f17-4654-9e6c-41858450fa80.name: Facilitation Skills Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: At the conclusion of this workshop, participants will be able to:• Apply the principles and techniques of adult learning to training in DP World materials.• Demonstrate the effective application of adult learning principles within the DP World environment.• Demonstrate key communication skills required by all successful facilitators of adult learning.• Utilise a range of training techniques which reflect principles of adult learning, particularly those which allow adult participants to infl

c86169b9-7ce3-4ac9-acce-f229701defc6.description: This is a 2-day programme conducted at your terminal. Day one is in the class and involves exercises and activities to support team building through the knowledge sharing. ​Day two involves a Port Visit so that participants can see for themselves how a real port works and the challenges and opportunities at the workplace.
c86169b9-7ce3-4ac9-acce-f229701defc6.name: Fundamentals of Terminal Operations

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Examine the ports and terminals industry, trends, and DPW’s evolving role in it. Examine the structure of an operating terminal and understand how all the various elements must work together to achieve effective outcomes. Recognize the key drivers of terminal performance and the main measures of performance on the ship, in the yard, and at the gate.

f0e2cc64-b95d-4810-89a8-bf0a93bc0f0a.description: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Adopt a systems approach to addressing issues in a terminal. Plan, implement, analyze and optimize capacity, equipment, and labor requirement more effectively. Understand the financial aspects of Terminal operations, including the fundamentals of budgeting and preparing a Capex Proposal. Use tools to maximize operational efficiency and effectiveness from available manpower and equipment.
f0e2cc64-b95d-4810-89a8-bf0a93bc0f0a.name: Managing Terminal Operations (Virtual)

badge_template_activities.title: Both modules are executed simultaneously using the results of the practical exercises nominated as “Games” to explain operational concepts, best practices and tools to improve performance. Throughout the MTO, participants will be presented with the latest challenges and opportunities our terminal operations are faced with.

31b05130-e7be-4189-9d91-3158a0b4b583.description: This program is designed for Women Managers from across the globe to help them: Initiate dialogues, share knowledge, and make a positive change. Become a champion for women1s development. Inspire others by sharing stories of your successes, challenges, and recommendations for peers in your group. Interact with leaders, experts, and peers to explore collaborations and partnerships for sustained development and progression.
31b05130-e7be-4189-9d91-3158a0b4b583.name: Women Lead@DP World Intermediate

badge_template_activities.title: This is delivered virtually, with 5 modules delivered in a span of 6 months. The participants will: Examine their personal narrative that drives their belief about their capabilities. Identify ways to drive their own career path and overcome headwinds that may be getting in the way. Identify key network-building approaches. and Commit to practical, actionable steps they can take to achieve their goals.

32cd8fbf-28b7-438d-a62b-6af4301f481e.description: This is delivered in six 2-hour sessions. The course will give participants accounting and finance fundamentals to read and interpret financial information; Talk the language of finance and accounting with confidence; Explain how your business unit’s operating results impact DP World’s bottom line; Discuss how budgets are built in DP World; Identify ways on how you can reduce your BU’s overall cost to help improve your overall profit;Make better businesses decisions using financial data
32cd8fbf-28b7-438d-a62b-6af4301f481e.name: Finance for Non Finance Managers

badge_template_activities.title: This is delivered in six 2-hour sessions. The course will give participants accounting and finance fundamentals to read and interpret financial information; Talk the language of finance and accounting with confidence; Explain how your business unit’s operating results impact DP World’s bottom line; Discuss how budgets are built in DP World; Identify ways on how you can reduce your BU’s overall cost to help improve your overall profit; Make better businesses decisions using financial data

7a1b1d59-65dc-446a-96d9-ee29c959a01e.description: The Certified Reliability Leader (CRL) program is an initiative created to improve reliability leadership skills within the company’s engineering and operations community. Reliability Leaders are given lessons on understanding concepts in reliability leadership, defecting elimination and failure analysis. Further, they are familiarized with the “language of reliability” which allows them to share thoughts with others to improve processes, clarify roles, and improve analytical capabilities.
7a1b1d59-65dc-446a-96d9-ee29c959a01e.name: Certified Reliability Leader

badge_template_activities.title: The Certified Reliability Leader (CRL) program is an initiative created to improve reliability leadership skills within the company’s engineering and operations community. Reliability Leaders are given lessons on understanding concepts in reliability leadership, defecting elimination and failure analysis. Further, they are familiarized with the “language of reliability” which allows them to readily share thoughts with others to improve process, clarify roles, and improve analytical capabilities.

c224104a-937d-4b16-bccc-8b179cafa3c4.description: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Explain the role of DP World within the supply chain through its ports and free economic zones. Recognize who is the customer, today and in the future, and how supply and demand influences supply chains. Explore how DP World connects with transport networks both inland and at sea. Gain insight into the supply chain value drivers from a customer’s perspective.
c224104a-937d-4b16-bccc-8b179cafa3c4.name: Certificate in Supply Chain and Logistics

badge_template_activities.title: This a self-paced e-learning accessible on iLearn. The 4 e-learning modules are hosted on our blended learning platform.The platform is easy to use, gives a step-by-step, structured learning experience that drives engagement with interactive modules, integrated assessments and polls. It is also mobile friendly which allows the participants to take the learning on the go whether it is on a commute to work or from the comfort of home!

f47161a7-0833-4c29-bbd4-528006c23cbe.description: This is an interactive 5-day planning workshop that combines a theoretical and a practical module. ​Both modules are executed simultaneously using the results of the practical exercises nominated as “Games” to explain operational concepts, best practices, and tools to improve performance. The theoretical part of the workshop will describe and explain basic and advance planning tools, best practices, and how to measure, understand and utilize efficiency and productivity KPIs.
f47161a7-0833-4c29-bbd4-528006c23cbe.name: Planning Terminal Operations

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Consider the challenges and opportunities of the terminal as a system Optimize Vessel Planning, Yard Planning, and Equipment DeploymentsUse of Advance Planning Optimization Tools (e.g. Autostow, Prime Route, Expert Decking) Access best practices in terms of Stacking and Operational Strategies Understand the effect in productivity and cost of different planning scenarios and operational decisions.

fc2acee2-8cf7-4efa-af1d-c73f11c530cf.description: The Senior Women Lead@DP World aims to support our Senior Women Managers to increase their impact and contribution in their roles and future career aspirations. The program is comprised of 8 modules, with line managers sessions, group exercises, and individual exercises delivered virtually within 6 to 8 months.
fc2acee2-8cf7-4efa-af1d-c73f11c530cf.name: Senior Women Lead@DP World

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Lead and engage in goal-oriented projects. Initiate dialogues, share knowledge and make a positive change. Become a champion for women's development. Inspire others by sharing stories of successes, challenges, and recommendations for peers in your group. Participate in individual and group activities, coaching sessions, and projects. Build relationships and make a difference to yourself and others.

178443a5-a96c-4f88-9e90-89990cb70edc.description: This programme is designed to help DP World as an organization, become a trade enabler by innovating in supply chain & logistics. This highly interactive course will give participants an in-depth knowledge of Supply Chain and Port logistics and will challenge them to find innovative solutions and services to extend DP World’s core business.
178443a5-a96c-4f88-9e90-89990cb70edc.name: Enable Trade: Global Supply Chain & Logistics Programme

badge_template_activities.title: This program is designed to help DP World as an organization, become a trade enabler by innovating in supply chain & logistics. This highly interactive course will give participants an in-depth knowledge of Supply Chain and Port logistics and will challenge them to find innovative solutions and services to extend DP World’s core business.

skills.name: Strategic Thinking Assessment Formulation Planning And Implementation

ff5ad624-c9d2-4bf8-be9b-18b5a1646206.description: The DP World Safe Leader Programme has been specifically created to develop CEO’s, Management, and Supervisors as SafeLeaders. It is an integral component of the DP World HSE Pillar of ‘Leadership and Engagement’ and will support these position holders to fully understand their accountabilities in supervising and directing staff.
ff5ad624-c9d2-4bf8-be9b-18b5a1646206.name: DP World Safe Leader Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Safe Leader

738749c0-864b-43fc-8c1d-c721779df09f.description: This is a useful learning for new joiners, especially those with no Terminal Operations experience.
738749c0-864b-43fc-8c1d-c721779df09f.name: DP World Link- Insights on Ports and Terminal Operations Links Program

badge_template_activities.title: Examine the ports and terminals industry, trends, and DPW’s evolving role in it. Examine the structure of an operating terminal and understand how all the various elements must work together to achieve effective outcomes. • Recognize the key drivers of terminal performance and the main measures of performance on the ship, in the yard, and at the gate. • Understand the main costs involved in operating a terminal and the differences in their nature and how they can have an impact on terminal

08632cd7-6ad3-443a-9923-b1e8b644b56e.description: T​he program will have the opportunity to learn/practice how to: Communicate effectively during a training and assessment situation at workUse Effective Training Techniques to ensure transfer of learning conduct Practical and Theory Operational Tasks & Equipment Lessons, Conduct Competency-Based Assessment for Equipment Operators & Other Operational Tasks
08632cd7-6ad3-443a-9923-b1e8b644b56e.name: Advanced Trainer and Assessor Program

badge_template_activities.title: This is a 5-day intensive and practical programme conducted at your terminal, involving ​an understanding of theory with classroom activities as well as practical implementation through the use of workplace equipment.

84cd75c5-b8e8-4f1e-8036-5c1a7ecdcbb5.description: This is a 3 and 1/2 day of training followed by 1/2 day of review and certification examination. Registered students are given access to the online version of the course via the Mobius Institute Learning Zone before the class and for six months after course completion to assist them with converting the course information into practice.
84cd75c5-b8e8-4f1e-8036-5c1a7ecdcbb5.name: Basic Vibration Analyst Training

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn: The benefits of performing condition monitoring and improving reliability condition monitoring technologies: acoustic emission, infrared analysis (thermography), oil analysis, wear particle analysis, motor testing how machines work – via supplementary self-study using the “Equipment Knowledge” section, and how vibration measurements can tell you about the condition of the machine

02c16a2e-7a0c-4c73-b505-ca78f875d1f2.description: This is a blended learning, with 8 weeks of e-learning with Uptime Elements and 4 days of live virtual training. This advanced workshop is designed for any team and/or individual who is a stakeholder in the management of maintenance. This course is constructed of 18 modules aligned with the skills required to become a Certified Maintenance Manager.
02c16a2e-7a0c-4c73-b505-ca78f875d1f2.name: Certified Maintenance Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who go through the program will have the opportunity to learn the skills required to become a Certified Maintenance Manager: Roles and responsibilitiesExpectations and requirementsGaining stability and controlDoing "right" work; Doing "work" right; Lifecycle management; Aligning objectives; Information and knowledgeIntangible Assets Regulatory Compliance Financial Assets Preventive maintenance; Work process and CMMS Operator Drive Reliability; Continuous Improvement

f6013e68-371e-4a9f-90c1-20da7d28bc8f.description: The MentorHer programme is a professional development program that helps women learn more about themselves, current strengths, and areas for development to help them advance in their careers. The programme is built to facilitate knowledge transfer with mentors who possess expertise and strength to inspire, motivate, and develop women to understand and accomplish their present and future vision and purpose.
f6013e68-371e-4a9f-90c1-20da7d28bc8f.name: MentorHer programme - Mentee

badge_template_activities.title: The programme is built to facilitate knowledge transfer with mentors who possess expertise and strength to inspire, motivate, and develop women to understand and accomplish their present and future vision and purpose.
